answers.answer: Is would love to know also I have to take the three hour one thursday

You will have to get a glucose machine and check your blood sugar 4times a day abd go on a low carb diet.   Your doc will set you up with a dietician and a nurse that will explain what you need to do. I have gd.
I failed my 1hr one horribly but i passed my 3hr one thankfully. Alot of women fail the 1hr one but pass the 3hr one.

Ok thanks! I hope I pass the 3 hr one because I just want to have a normal pregnancy for once lol with my 1st I had preeclampsia and my 2nd I had preeclampsia and he was also breech til 38 wks. Did your doctors give you the results of the 3 hr the same day?

This just recently happened to me as well. I was informed that once u fail both tests u will have gestational diabetes which should not last after u have the baby. Only happens to very few women  to keep diabetes after the baby because our bodies sometimes slow down on producing it own insulin.
I unfortunately failed my 1hr again ugh have togo in tomorrow to take the 3 hour one also not lookin forward to that such a pain in the arse
I passed my 1hr test and im glad i dont have to take 3hr test
My ob called three hrs after i left the lab and gave me the results. I already knew the results though because Im registered online to see my labs and i peeked before the ob called me.

question: I failed my 1 hour glucose test, so now my doc wants me to come in tomorrow to take the 3 hour test...I'm wondering if anyone knows what will happen if I fail that one?
title: gestational diabetes
